info.name: Lifeup
info.description:
环境配置说明：
> 本地环境：
	v1: 127.0.0.1:3001/lifeup

> 测试环境：
	v1: 18.138.114.203:3333/lifeup

> 图片路径：
	'https://s3-ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/ebuymart/' + cover
 
请求参数配置：
headers 头部 Authorization设置token   

**token 暂定为**

'eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJjdXN0b21lckZyb20iOiJsaWZldXAiLCJpYXQiOjE1ODQ0MjIxNTcsImV4cCI6MTYxNTk3OTc1N30.eOYbtGFNlxwKRmUDN50idfGgDN70kFq7iT9og-pNJ2w'

request.description:
返回信息：
```js
[
    {
        "_id": "5df4ab66afbe6b8906213cae",
        "name_ch": "新鲜蔬菜",
        "name_en": "Fresh Vegetables",
        "cover": "uploads/image-1536236057625547.jpg",
        "subs": [
            {
                "_id": "5df4ab66afbe6b8906213cbf",
                "name_ch": "叶菜类",
                "name_en": "Leafy Vegetables",
                "cover": "uploads/image-1534852669282446.jpg"
            },
            ...
        ]
    }
    ...
]
```
字段说明：
```js
{
	_id:"一级分类id",
	name_ch:"商品中文名",
	cover:"一级分类封面图",
	subs:"二级分类相关信息"
	...
}
```

返回示例
```js
{
    "stock": {
        "unit": "ctn",
        "sale": 99954,
        "real": 99954,
        "threshold": 0
    },
    "images": [
        "uploads/AWS-1548240116060.jpeg",
        "uploads/AWS-1548240116163.jpeg"
    ],
    "_id": "5df4ab8067a3709e16a5b90f",
    "name_ch": "日本王林苹果",
    "name_en": "Japanese Wang Lin Apple",
    "origin_ch": "日本",
    "origin_en": "Japanese",
    "desc_ch": "日本福岛县用金冠与印度杂交选育而成，1952年命名。排名全球前5的苹果",
    "desc_en": "Fukushima Prefecture, Japan, was selected from the Golden Crown and India, and was named in 1952. Ranked among the top 5 apples in the world",
    "father": "5df4ab66afbe6b8906213cb9",
    "specifications": [
        {
            "_id": "5df4ab8067a3709e16a5b910",
            "spec_ch": "1箱",
            "spec_en": "1ctn",
            "cprice": 2.49,
            "oprice": null,
            "limit": 2,
            "ratio": 1,
            "sku": "FRU190016"
        }
    ],
    "spu": "FRU190016",
    "cover": "uploads/AWS-1548240105974.jpeg",
    "createTime": "2019-12-14T09:29:30.217Z",
    "costPrice": 2,
    "attributes": [],
    "suppliers": []
}
```
字段说明
```js
{
    "stock": {
        "unit": "库存单位",
        "sale": '售卖库存',
        "real": '实际库存',
        "threshold": '库存警告阈值'
    },
    "images": [详情图片，多张],
    "_id": "5df4ab8067a3709e16a5b90f",
    "name_ch": "中文名称",
    "name_en": "英文名称",
    "origin_ch": "产地",
    "origin_en": "产地",
    "desc_ch": "描述",
    "desc_en": "描述",
    "father": "所属分类，二级分类",
    "specifications": [
        {
            "_id": "5df4ab8067a3709e16a5b910",
            "spec_ch": "规格",
            "spec_en": "规格",
            "cprice": '现价',
            "oprice": '原价',
            "limit": '限购',
            "ratio": '换算比',
            "sku": "sku"
        }
    ],
    "spu": "spu",
    "cover": "封面图片",
    "createTime": "创建时间",
    "costPrice": "",
    "attributes": [],
}
```

query.description: 分类ID，一级分类id或者二级分类id 。。注意：**必填选项**
排序参数，默认值：hot  可选项：hot/new/priceUp/priceDown

request.description:
返回信息
```js
{
    "total": 106,
    "goods": [
        {
            "_id": "5df4ab7b67a3709e16a5b7cd",
            "name_ch": "中国紫包菜(称重）",
            "name_en": "China Red Cabbage(Weight)",
            "desc_ch": "含活力花青素 口感清新脆爽",
            "desc_en": "",
            "cover": "uploads/image-153268843086423.jpg",
            "ratio": 1,
            "spec_ch": "1箱",
            "spec_en": "1ctn",
            "cprice": 2.25,
            "oprice": null,
            "limit": 0,
            "sku": "VEG190005",
            "ifWeigh": false,
            "remain": 99906
        },
        ...
    ]
}
```
字段说明:
```js
{
	total:"查询得到的商品总量",
	goods:"查询到的商品数组",
	goods:{
		"_id": "商品id",
        "name_ch": "中文名称",
        "name_en": "英文名称",
        "desc_ch": "中文描述",
        "desc_en": "英文描述",
        "cover": "封面路径",
        "ratio":  "换算比"
        "spec_ch": "规格中文",
        "spec_en": "英文",
        "cprice": "现价",
        "oprice": "原价",
        "limit": "购买限制",
        "sku": "SKU",
        "ifWeigh": "是否称重",
        "remain": "剩余数量"
	}
	
}
```

query.description: 查询关键字参数，注意：必填选项
排序参数，默认值：hot  可选项：hot/new/priceUp/priceDown

request.description:
返回信息
```js
{
    "total": 3,
    "goods": [
        {
            "_id": "5df4ab8067a3709e16a5b90f",
            "name_ch": "日本王林苹果",

            "desc_ch": "日本福岛县用金冠与印度杂交选育而成，1952年命名。排名全球前5的苹果",

            "limit": 2,

}
```

```js
{
    "total": '数量',
    "goods": [
        {
            "_id": "id",
            "name_ch": "name",
            "name_en": "name",

            "ifWeigh": '是否称重',
            "remain": '剩余数量'
        },
        ...
    ]
}
```

item.name: 订单相关

request.description:
返回信息示例:
```js
{
    "total": 70,
    "orders": [
        {
            "_id": "5e70750f3feaec02e088b570",
            "orderTime": "2020-03-17T06:58:23.159Z",
            "status": "cancelled",
            "receiver": {
                "name": "hdx2020",
                "phone": "9999",
                "unit": "ok这是unit",
                "address": "BLK, 445, Yishun Avenue 11",
                "postcode": "760445",
                "tag": "公司"
            },
            "ifPaid": "paid",
            "deliveryDate": "2020-03-18T00:00:00.000Z",
            "goodsList": [
                {
                    "cover": "uploads/AWS-1557215059875.jpeg"
                }
            ],
            "items": 1,
            "total": 300
        },
        ...
}
```

字段说明：
```js
{
    "total": 订单总量 // 分页返回
    "orders": [
        {
            "_id": "订单ID",
            "orderTime": "下单时间",
            "status": "订单状态",
            "receiver": { // 收货人信息
                "name": "hdx2020",
                "phone": "9999",
                "unit": "ok这是unit",
                "address": "BLK, 445, Yishun Avenue 11",
                "postcode": "760445",
                "tag": "公司"
            },
            "ifPaid": "支付状态", // 默认已支付
            "deliveryDate": "配送时间",
            "goodsList": [ // 商品封面图片链接
                {
                    "cover": "uploads/AWS-1557215059875.jpeg"
                }
            ],
            "items": 订单内商品数量
            "total": 订单总价
        },
        ...
}
```

返回信息：
```js
{
    "ifPaid": "paid",
    "receiver": {
        "name": "hdx2020",
        "phone": "9999",
        "unit": "ok这是unit",
        "address": "BLK, 445, Yishun Avenue 11",
        "postcode": "760445",
        "tag": "公司"
    },
    "status": "waiting",
    "deliveryDate": "2020-03-05T00:00:00.000Z",
    "slot": "2:00 pm - 7:00 pm",
    "address": "ok这是unit, BLK, 445, Yishun Avenue 11",
    "goodsList": [
        {
            "cover": "uploads/AWS-1557215059875.jpeg",
            "ifWeigh": false,
            "name_ch": "印尼蜜薯",
            "name_en": "Indonesia Sweet Potato",
            "spec_ch": "1箱",
            "spec_en": "1ctn",
            "cprice": 3,
            "oprice": null,
            "quantity": 10,
            "given": 0,
            "product": "5df4ab8b67a3709e16a5bb77",
            "sku": "VEG190111"
        }
    ],
    "deliveryFee": 0,
    "code": "4XSy-ezRb-fn5H-WCi9",
    "orderTime": "2020-03-17T05:44:51.392Z"
}
```
字段说明：

```js
{
    "ifPaid": 支付状态,
    "receiver": { // 收货人信息
        "name": "hdx2020",
        "phone": "9999",
        "unit": "ok这是unit",
        "address": "BLK, 445, Yishun Avenue 11",
        "postcode": "760445",
        "tag": "公司"
    },
    "status": 订单状态,
    "deliveryDate": "配送时间",
    "slot": "配送时间段",
    "address": 送货地址,
    "goodsList": [ // 商品信息
        {
            "cover": "uploads/AWS-1557215059875.jpeg",
            "ifWeigh": false,
            "name_ch": "印尼蜜薯",
            "name_en": "Indonesia Sweet Potato",
            "spec_ch": "1箱",
            "spec_en": "1ctn",
            "cprice": 3,
            "oprice": null,
            "quantity": 10,
            "given": 0,
            "product": "5df4ab8b67a3709e16a5bb77",
            "sku": "VEG190111"
        }
    ],
    "deliveryFee": 配送费,
    "code": "订单号",
    "orderTime": "下单时间"
}
```

返回信息
```js
{
    "type": "普通",
    "_id": "5e6f1e6b2fd5604e417bec62",
    "code": "MpHy-hKyo-lG5u-dSmE",
    "orderTime": "2020-03-16T06:36:27.419Z",
    "goods": [
        {
            "_id": "5e6f1e6b2fd5604e417bec63",
            "goodInfo": {
                "product": "5df4ab8b67a3709e16a5bb77",
                "sku": "VEG190111",
                "name_ch": "印尼蜜薯",
                "name_en": "Indonesia Sweet Potato",
                "spec_ch": "1箱",
                "spec_en": "1ctn",
                "costPrice": 2,
                "cprice": 3,
                "oprice": null,
                "category": "新鲜蔬菜"
            },
            "quantity": 10,
            "given": 0,
            "ifWeigh": false
        }
    ],
    "receiver": {
        "name": "hdx2020",
        "phone": "9999",
        "unit": "ok这是unit",
        "address": "BLK, 445, Yishun Avenue 11",
        "postcode": "760445",
        "tag": "公司"
    },
    "delivery": {
        "date": "2020-03-05T00:00:00.000Z",
        "slot": "2:00 pm - 7:00 pm",
    },
    "status": "waiting",
    "customer": "5e4b83ef520dc07dc02edcb9",
    "remark": {
        "company": "",
        "customer": "留言"
    },
    "__v": 0
}
```
字段说明:
```js
{

    "type": "普通",
    "_id": "订单id",
    "code": "订单号",
    "orderTime": "订单时间",
    "goods": [
        {
            "_id": "商品id",
            "goodInfo": { // 商品信息
                "product": "5df4ab8b67a3709e16a5bb77",
                "sku": "VEG190111",
                "name_ch": "印尼蜜薯",
                "name_en": "Indonesia Sweet Potato",
                "spec_ch": "1箱",
                "spec_en": "1ctn",
                "costPrice": 2,
                "cprice": 3,
                "oprice": null,
                "category": "新鲜蔬菜"
            },
            "quantity": 10,
            "given": 0,
            "ifWeigh": false
        }
    ],
    "receiver": { // 收货相关信息
        "name": "hdx2020",
        "phone": "9999",
        "unit": "ok这是unit",
        "address": "BLK, 445, Yishun Avenue 11",
        "postcode": "760445",
        "tag": "公司"
    },
    "delivery": {
        "date": "配送日期",
        "slot": "配送时间段",
    },
    "status": "订单状态",，正在处理，打包，配送
    "customer": "用户id",
    "remark": {
        "company": "",
        "customer": "留言"
    },
    "__v": 0
}
```
传入body参数说明：
```js
{
    "remark":"留言",
    "goods":[
		{"product": "商品ID", "quantity": 购买数量, "sku": "SKU"}
	],
    "receiver":{
                    "name":"收货人",
                    "phone":电话号码,
                    "district":"区域地址 ID", // 
                    "unit": "家单元号",
                    "tag":"标签", // 家，公司，学校，代收点
                    "deliveryDate":"2020-03-05" // 配送日期。注意：格式要求如上
                },
    "customer":"用户ID",
}
```
其中 receiver中的district  
通过**邮编验证**获取，

item.description:
下单前须知：


相关API返回信息见 ‘获取客户配送信息’

**起送价要求**  ：满足起送价要求，  

**配送日期要求**  ：只能在指定日期配送   
 
**免运费要求**  ：达到一定条件可以免配送费   


> 如果日期 valid:False,则无法在那天配送



订单状态说明：
```js
{
	waiting:'待处理',
	processing:'备货中',
	packaged:'已打包',
	shipping:'送货中',
	delevered:'已送达',
	received:'已签收',
	cancelled:'已取消',
	deleted:'已删除
}
```

注：
1. **生成的订单默认已支付**
2. 只有waiting状态的订单可以取消
3.

request.description:
说明：

**创建地址前必须查询邮编判断是否已有区域登记 获取district id**

两种情况：

1. 已存在district 
填入相关信息即可

2. 不存在district 
则需要
新加一个builid字段  例如
```js
building:'地址详情'

```
结合其他信息，可创建地址

返回信息：我的地址列表
```js
[
    {
        "createTime": "2020-03-10T05:59:55.128Z",
        "_id": "5e672cdbc8a6a36ccfb10222",
        "phone": "76044565",
        "unit": "hasd'",
        "tag": "School",
        "gender": "Male",
        "receiver": "hell",
        "ifDefault": true,
        "district": "5dfca2c71a7feada9fa0c388"
    },
    ...
]
```
